content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for your interest in the apartment. I am open to discussing the rental price with you. What price range are you willing to negotiate within?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to negotiate within a range of 800-900 euros per month. What do you propose?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in renting my apartment. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I propose a rental price of 900 euros per month. This price is competitive in the area and reflects the value of the apartment. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, that is within my budget. I agree to the price of 900 euros per month.
```
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Great! I am glad we were able to come to an agreement on the rental price. Please let me know if you have any additional questions or concerns. I look forward to working with you as a tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
